thread.title: Roads closed in Leicester after serious crash
thread.title_full: Roads closed in Leicester after serious crash | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Roads closed in Leicester after serious crash
text:
Leicestershire Police have tweeted to say there are a number of road closures in Leicester after a serious crash.
LeicestershirePolice @leicspolice Follow SERIOUS ROAD COLLISION HAS RESULTED IN ROAD CLOSURES, BEAUMONT LEYS LA AND LEYS CROFT AND MADELINE ROAD - PLEASE AVOID AREA IF POSSIBLE
07:46 - 6 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite The force says Beaumont Leys Lane, Leys Croft and Madeline Road are closed, and are advising people to avoid the area.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Travel Leicester
